00074 
00075 ConjugateGradient::ConjugateGradient(ObjectiveFunctional* newObjectiveFunctional)
00076 : TrainingAlgorithm(newObjectiveFunctional)
00077 {
00078    // Training operators
00079 
00080    trainDirectionMethod = FletcherReeves;
00081    trainRateMethod = BrentMethod;
00082 
00083    // Training parameters 
00084 
00085    firstTrainRate = 1.0e-3;
00086    bracketingFactor = 2.0;
00087    trainRateTolerance = 1.0e-6;
00088 
00089    // Stopping criteria
00090 
00091    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00092    gradientNormGoal = 0.0;
00093    maximumTime = 1.0e69;
00094    maximumNumberOfEpochs = 100;
00095 
00096    // User stuff
00097 
00098    warningTrainRate = 1.0e6;
00099    errorTrainRate = 1.0e12;
00100    displayPeriod = 25; 
00101    
00102    reserveTrainingDirectionHistory = false;
00103    reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory = false;
00104    reserveTrainingRateHistory = false;
00105    
00106 }

00401 void ConjugateGradient::setFirstTrainRate(double newFirstTrainRate)
00402 { 
00403    // Control sentence (if debug)
00404 
00405    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00406 
00407    if(newFirstTrainRate <= 0.0)
00408    {
00409       std::cerr << std::endl
00410                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
00411                 << "void setFirstTrainRate(double) method."
00412                 << std::endl
00413                 << "First train rate must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00414                 << std::endl;
00415 
00416       exit(1);
00417    }
00418 
00419    #endif
00420 
00421    // Set first train rate
00422 
00423    firstTrainRate = newFirstTrainRate;
00424 }

00669 // double calculateFletcherReevesParameter(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00670 
00678 
00679 double ConjugateGradient::calculateFletcherReevesParameter(Vector<double> oldGradient, Vector<double> gradient)
00680 {
00681    double FletcherReevesParameter = 0.0;
00682 
00683    double numerator = gradient.dot(gradient);
00684    double denominator = oldGradient.dot(oldGradient);
00685 
00686    // Prevent a possible division by 0
00687 
00688    if(denominator == 0.0)
00689    {
00690       FletcherReevesParameter = 0.0;
00691    }
00692    else
00693    {
00694       FletcherReevesParameter = numerator/denominator;
00695    }
00696 
00697    // Bound the Fletcher-Reeves parameter between 0 and 1
00698 
00699    if(FletcherReevesParameter < 0.0)
00700       FletcherReevesParameter = 0.0;
00701 
00702    if(FletcherReevesParameter > 1.0)
00703       FletcherReevesParameter = 1.0;
00704 
00705    return(FletcherReevesParameter);
00706 }
00707 
00708 
00709 // double calculatePolakRibiereParameter(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00710 //
00718 
00719 double ConjugateGradient::calculatePolakRibiereParameter(Vector<double> oldGradient, Vector<double> gradient)
00720 {
00721    double PolakRibiereParameter = 0.0;
00722 
00723    double numerator = (gradient-oldGradient).dot(gradient);
00724    double denominator = oldGradient.dot(oldGradient);
00725 
00726    // Prevent a possible division by 0
00727 
00728    if(denominator == 0.0)
00729    {
00730       PolakRibiereParameter = 0.0;
00731    }
00732    else
00733    {
00734       PolakRibiereParameter = numerator/denominator;
00735    }
00736 
00737    // Bound the Polak-Ribiere parameter between 0 and 1
00738 
00739    if(PolakRibiereParameter < 0.0)
00740       PolakRibiereParameter = 0.0;
00741 
00742    if(PolakRibiereParameter > 1.0)
00743       PolakRibiereParameter = 1.0;
00744 
00745    return(PolakRibiereParameter);
00746 }
00747 
00748 
00749 // Vector<double> calculateFletcherReevesTrainDirection
00750 // (Vector<double>, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00751 //
00762 
00763 Vector<double> ConjugateGradient::calculateFletcherReevesTrainDirection
00764 (Vector<double> oldGradient, Vector<double> gradient, Vector<double> oldTrainDirection)
00765 {
00766    double FletcherReevesParameter = calculateFletcherReevesParameter(oldGradient, gradient);
00767 
00768    Vector<double> FletcherReevesTrainDirection = gradient*(-1.0) + oldTrainDirection*FletcherReevesParameter;
00769 
00770    return(FletcherReevesTrainDirection);
00771 }
00772 
00773 
00774 // Vector<double> calculatePolakRibiereTrainDirection(Vector<double>, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00775 //
00786 
00787 Vector<double> ConjugateGradient::calculatePolakRibiereTrainDirection
00788 (Vector<double> oldGradient, Vector<double> gradient, Vector<double> oldTrainDirection)
00789 {
00790    double PolakRibiereParameter = calculatePolakRibiereParameter(oldGradient, gradient);
00791 
00792    Vector<double> PolakRibiereTrainDirection = gradient*(-1.0) + oldTrainDirection*PolakRibiereParameter;
00793 
00794    return(PolakRibiereTrainDirection);
00795 }

00797 
00798 // double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00799 
00810  
00811 double ConjugateGradient::calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate
00812 (double initialTrainRate, double evaluation,
00813 Vector<double> freeParameters, Vector<double> trainDirection)
00814 {
00815    double trainRate = 0.0;
00816 
00817    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron 
00818    = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00819 
00820    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
00821 
00822    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
00823 
00824    double a = 0.0;
00825    double evaluationA = 0.0;
00826    double b = 0.0;
00827    double evaluationB = 0.0;
00828 
00829    double c = 0.0;   
00830    double evaluationC = 0.0;
00831    double d = 0.0;   
00832    double evaluationD = 0.0;
00833 
00834    double tau = (3.0-sqrt(5.0))/2.0; // 0.382
00835 
00836    // Start golden section search
00837 
00838    // Set initial a point
00839 
00840    a = 0.0;
00841 
00842    // Calculate evaluation for a
00843 
00844    evaluationA = evaluation;
00845 
00846    // Set initial b point
00847 
00848    b = initialTrainRate;
00849 
00850    // Calculate evaluation for b
00851 
00852    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00853 
00854    evaluationB = objectiveFunctional
00855    ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00856 
00857    // Find initial interval where minimum evaluation occurs
00858 
00859    while(evaluationA > evaluationB)
00860    {
00861       // Reset a point and corresponding evaluation 
00862 
00863       a = b;
00864       evaluationA = evaluationB;
00865 
00866       // Set new b
00867 
00868       b *= bracketingFactor;
00869 
00870       if(b >= errorTrainRate)
00871       {
00872          std::cerr << std::endl
00873                    << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
00874                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00875                    << "Unable to bracket a minimum." << std::endl;
00876                    
00877          exit(1);
00878       }
00879       else if(display && b >= warningTrainRate)
00880       {
00881          std::cout << std::endl
00882                    << "Flood Warning: Train rate is " << b
00883                    << std::endl;
00884       }
00885 
00886       // Calculate evaluation for new b
00887 
00888       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00889 
00890       evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00891    }
00892 
00893    // Initialize c and d (interior points for line minimization)
00894 
00895    // Initialize c point
00896 
00897    c = a + tau*(b-a);
00898 
00899    // Calculate evaluation for c
00900 
00901    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*c;
00902 
00903    evaluationC = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00904 
00905    // Initialize d point
00906 
00907    d = b - tau*(b-a);
00908 
00909    // Calculate evaluation for d
00910 
00911    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*d;
00912 
00913    evaluationD = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00914 
00915    // Reduce the interval with the golden section algorithm
00916 
00917    while(b-a > trainRateTolerance)
00918    {
00919       Vector<double> evaluationVectorLeft(3);
00920       evaluationVectorLeft[0] = evaluationA;
00921       evaluationVectorLeft[1] = evaluationC;
00922       evaluationVectorLeft[2] = evaluationD;
00923 
00924       double minimumEvaluationLeft = evaluationVectorLeft.calculateMinimum();
00925 
00926       Vector<double> evaluationVectorRight(3);
00927       evaluationVectorRight[0] = evaluationB;
00928       evaluationVectorRight[1] = evaluationC;
00929       evaluationVectorRight[2] = evaluationD;
00930 
00931       double minimumEvaluationRight = evaluationVectorRight.calculateMinimum();
00932 
00933       if((evaluationC < evaluationD && evaluationB >= minimumEvaluationLeft)
00934       || (evaluationA <  minimumEvaluationRight))
00935 
00936       // There is a minimum between a and b
00937       {
00938          b=d; 
00939          d=c; 
00940 
00941          evaluationB = evaluationD;
00942          evaluationD = evaluationC;
00943 
00944          // Set new c point
00945 
00946          c = a + tau*(b-a);
00947 
00948          // Calculate evaluation for new c
00949 
00950          potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*c;
00951 
00952          evaluationC = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00953       }
00954       else if((evaluationD < evaluationC && evaluationA >= minimumEvaluationRight)
00955       || (evaluationB < minimumEvaluationLeft))   
00956 
00957       // There is a minimum between c and b
00958       {
00959          a = c; 
00960          c = d; 
00961 
00962          evaluationA = evaluationC;
00963          evaluationC = evaluationD;
00964 
00965          // Set new d point
00966 
00967          d = b - tau*(b-a);
00968 
00969          // Calculate evaluation for new d
00970 
00971          potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*d;
00972 
00973          evaluationD = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00974       }
00975       else
00976       {
00977          std::cerr << std::endl
00978                    << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
00979                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate "
00980                    << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00981                    << "Unable to find were the minimum is." << std::endl;
00982 
00983          exit(1);
00984       }
00985    }
00986 
00987    // Get minimum evaluation and train rate among points A, B, C and D
00988 
00989    double minimumEvaluation = evaluation;
00990 
00991    if(evaluationA < minimumEvaluation)
00992    {
00993       minimumEvaluation  = evaluationA;
00994       trainRate = a;
00995    }
00996    else if(evaluationB < minimumEvaluation)
00997    {
00998       minimumEvaluation = evaluationB;
00999       trainRate = b;
01000    }
01001    else if(evaluationC < minimumEvaluation)
01002    {
01003       minimumEvaluation = evaluationC;
01004       trainRate = c;
01005    }
01006    else if(evaluationD < minimumEvaluation)
01007    {
01008       minimumEvaluation = evaluationD;
01009       trainRate = d;
01010    }
01011 
01012    return(trainRate);
01013 }
01014 
01015 
01016 // double calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>)
01017 // method
01018 
01029 
01030 double ConjugateGradient::calculateBrentMethodTrainRate
01031 (double initialTrainRate, double evaluation,
01032 Vector<double> freeParameters, Vector<double> trainDirection)
01033 {
01034    double trainRate = 0.0;
01035 
01036    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron 
01037    = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01038 
01039    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
01040 
01041    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
01042 
01043    double a = 0.0;
01044    double evaluationA = 0.0;
01045    double b = 0.0;
01046    double evaluationB = 0.0;
01047 
01048    double u = 0.0;
01049    double evaluationU = 0.0;
01050    double v = 0.0;
01051    double evaluationV = 0.0;
01052    double w = 0.0;
01053    double evaluationW = 0.0;
01054    double x = 0.0;
01055    double evaluationX = 0.0;
01056 
01057    double tau = (3.0-sqrt(5.0))/2.0; // 0.382
01058 
01059    // Start Brent search
01060 
01061    // Set initial a point
01062 
01063    a = 0.0;
01064 
01065    // Calculate evaluation for a
01066 
01067    evaluationA = evaluation;
01068 
01069    // Set initial b point
01070 
01071    b = initialTrainRate;
01072 
01073    // Calculate evaluation for b
01074 
01075    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
01076 
01077    evaluationB = objectiveFunctional
01078    ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
01079 
01080    // Find initial interval where minimum evaluation occurs
01081 
01082    while(evaluationA >= evaluationB)
01083    {
01084       // Reset a point and corresponding evaluation 
01085 
01086       a = b;
01087       evaluationA = evaluationB;
01088 
01089       // Set new b
01090 
01091       b *= bracketingFactor;
01092 
01093       if(b >= errorTrainRate)
01094       {
01095          std::cerr << std::endl
01096                    << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
01097                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
01098                    << "Unable to bracket a minimum." << std::endl;
01099                    
01100          exit(1);
01101       }
01102       else if(display && b >= warningTrainRate)
01103       {
01104          std::cout << std::endl
01105                    << "Flood Warning: Train rate is  " << b
01106                    << std::endl;
01107       }
01108 
01109       // Calculate evaluation for new b
01110 
01111       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
01112 
01113       evaluationB = objectiveFunctional
01114       ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
01115    }
01116 
01117    // Get inediate point V
01118 
01119    v = a + tau*(b-a);
01120 
01121    // Calculate evaluation for V
01122 
01123    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*v;
01124 
01125    evaluationV = objectiveFunctional
01126    ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
01127 
01128    // Set initial W and X points
01129 
01130    w = v;
01131    evaluationW = evaluationV;
01132 
01133    x = v;
01134    evaluationX = evaluationV;
01135 
01136    // Maximum and minimum intervals ???
01137 
01138    bool goldenSection = false;
01139 
01140    // Reduce the interval
01141 
01142    while(b-a > trainRateTolerance)
01143    {
01144       // Quadratic interpolation
01145 
01146       if(w != x && w != v && x != v) // Can construct parabola 
01147       {
01148          // zz vector
01149 
01150          Vector<double> trainRateVector(3);
01151          trainRateVector[0] = v;
01152          trainRateVector[1] = w;
01153          trainRateVector[2] = x;
01154 
01155          std::sort(trainRateVector.begin(), trainRateVector.end(), std::less<double>());
01156 
01157          // pp vector
01158 
01159          Vector<double> evaluationVector(3);
01160 
01161          for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
01162          {
01163             if(trainRateVector[i] == v)
01164             {
01165                evaluationVector[i] = evaluationV;
01166             }
01167             else if(trainRateVector[i] == w)
01168             {
01169                trainRateVector[i] = evaluationW;
01170             }
01171             else if(trainRateVector[i] == x)
01172             {
01173                trainRateVector[i] = evaluationX;
01174             }
01175             else
01176             {
01177                std::cerr << std::endl
01178                          << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
01179                          << "double calculateBrentMethodTrainRate" << std::endl
01180                          << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." 
01181                          << std::endl
01182                          << "Unable to construct train rate and evaluation vectors right."
01183                          << std::endl << std::endl;
01184 
01185                exit(1);
01186             }
01187          }
01188 
01189          // xStar is the minimum of the parabola through the three train rate points
01190 
01191          double numerator 
01192          = (pow(trainRateVector[2],2) - pow(trainRateVector[1],2))*evaluationVector[0]
01193          + (pow(trainRateVector[1],2) - pow(trainRateVector[0],2))*evaluationVector[2]
01194          + (pow(trainRateVector[0],2) - pow(trainRateVector[2],2))*evaluationVector[1];
01195 
01196          double denominator
01197          = (trainRateVector[2] - trainRateVector[1])*evaluationVector[0]
01198          + (trainRateVector[1] - trainRateVector[0])*evaluationVector[2]
01199          + (trainRateVector[0] - trainRateVector[2])*evaluationVector[1];
01200 
01201          double xStar = 0.5*numerator/denominator;
01202 
01203          if(xStar < b && a < xStar) // xStar is in [a,b]
01204          {
01205             u = xStar;
01206 
01207             // Good, no need to perform golden section
01208 
01209             goldenSection = false;
01210          }
01211          else // xStar is not in [a,b]
01212          {
01213             // Bad, need to perform golden section
01214 
01215             goldenSection = true;
01216          }
01217       }
01218       else // Cannot construct parabola
01219       {
01220          // Bad, need to perform golden section
01221 
01222          goldenSection = true;
01223       }
01224 
01225       //
01226       // Golden section
01227       //
01228 
01229       if(goldenSection == true)
01230       {
01231          if(x >= (a+b)/2.0)
01232          {
01233             u = x-tau*(x-a);
01234          }
01235          else
01236          {
01237             u = x+tau*(b-x);
01238          }
01239       }
01240 
01241       // Calculate evaluation for U
01242 
01243       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*u;
01244 
01245       evaluationU = objectiveFunctional
01246       ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
01247 
01248       // Update points
01249 
01250       if(evaluationU <= evaluationX)
01251       {
01252          if(u < x)
01253          {
01254             b = x;
01255             evaluationB = evaluationX;
01256          }
01257          else
01258          {
01259             a = x;
01260             evaluationA = evaluationX;
01261          }
01262 
01263          v = w; 
01264          evaluationV = evaluationW;
01265 
01266          w = x;
01267          evaluationW = evaluationX;
01268 
01269          x = u; 
01270          evaluationX = evaluationU;
01271       }
01272       else
01273       {
01274          if(u < x)
01275          {
01276             a = u;
01277             evaluationA = evaluationU;
01278          }
01279          else
01280          {
01281             b = u;
01282             evaluationB = evaluationU;
01283          }
01284 
01285          if((evaluationU <= evaluationW) || (w == x))
01286          {
01287              v = w; 
01288              evaluationV = evaluationW;
01289 
01290              w = u; 
01291              evaluationW = evaluationU;
01292          }
01293          else if((evaluationU <= evaluationV) || (v == x) || (v == w))
01294          {
01295             v = u; 
01296             evaluationV = evaluationU;
01297          }
01298       }
01299    } // while loop 
01300 
01301    // Get minimum evaluation and train rate among points A, B, V, W and X
01302 
01303    double minimumEvaluation = evaluation;
01304 
01305    if(evaluationA <= minimumEvaluation)
01306    {
01307       minimumEvaluation = evaluationA;
01308       trainRate = a;
01309    }
01310    else if(evaluationB <= minimumEvaluation)
01311    {
01312       minimumEvaluation = evaluationB;
01313       trainRate = b;
01314    } 
01315    else if(evaluationV <= minimumEvaluation)
01316    {
01317       minimumEvaluation = evaluationV;
01318       trainRate = v;
01319    }
01320    else if(evaluationW <= minimumEvaluation)
01321    {
01322       minimumEvaluation = evaluationW;
01323       trainRate = w;
01324    }
01325    else if(evaluationX <= minimumEvaluation)
01326    {
01327       minimumEvaluation = evaluationX;
01328       trainRate = x;
01329    }
01330 
01331    return(trainRate);
01332 }
01333 
01334 
01335 // void train(void) method
01336 
01343 
01344 void ConjugateGradient::train(void)
01345 {
01346    // Control sentence (if debug)
01347 
01348    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01349 
01350    if(objectiveFunctional == NULL)
01351    {
01352       std::cerr << std::endl
01353                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
01354                 << "void train(void) method." << std::endl
01355                 << "Pointer to objective functional object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
01356                 << std::endl;
01357 
01358         exit(1);
01359    }
01360 
01361    #endif
01362 
01363    // Multilayer perceptron stuff
01364 
01365    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01366 
01367    resizeTrainingHistory(1+maximumNumberOfEpochs);
01368 
01369    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
01370 
01371    // Free parameters
01372 
01373    Vector<double> freeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
01374 
01375    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01376    {
01377       freeParametersHistory.setRow(0, freeParameters);
01378    }
01379 
01380    // Free parameters norm
01381 
01382    double freeParametersNorm = freeParameters.calculateNorm();
01383 
01384    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
01385    {
01386       freeParametersNormHistory[0] = freeParametersNorm; 
01387    }
01388 
01389    if(display && (freeParametersNorm >= warningFreeParametersNorm))
01390    {
01391       std::cout << "Flood Warning: Initial free parameters norm is " << freeParametersNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01392    }
01393    
01394    // Training time stuff
01395 
01396    time_t beginningTime, currentTime;
01397    double elapsedTime = 0.0;
01398 
01399    // Start training 
01400 
01401    time(&beginningTime);
01402 
01403    if(display)
01404    {
01405       std::cout << std::endl
01406                 << "Training with conjugate gradient..." 
01407                 << std::endl;
01408    }
01409    
01410    // Initial evaluation
01411    
01412    double evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
01413 
01414    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
01415    {
01416       evaluationHistory[0] = evaluation; 
01417    }
01418 
01419    // Initial objective function gradient
01420 
01421    Vector<double> gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
01422 
01423    if(reserveGradientHistory)
01424    {
01425       gradientHistory.setRow(0, gradient); 
01426    }
01427 
01428    // Initial gradient norm 
01429 
01430    double gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
01431 
01432    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
01433    {
01434       gradientNormHistory[0] = gradientNorm; 
01435    }
01436 
01437    if(display && (gradientNorm >= warningGradientNorm))
01438    {
01439       std::cout << "Flood Warning: Initial gradient norm is " << gradientNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01440    }
01441 
01442    time(&currentTime);
01443    elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01444 
01445    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
01446    {
01447       elapsedTimeHistory[0] = elapsedTime; 
01448    }
01449 
01450    // Stopping criteria
01451 
01452    if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
01453    {
01454       if(display)
01455       {          
01456          std::cout << std::endl
01457                    << "Initial evaluation is less than goal." << std::endl;
01458 
01459          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01460 
01461          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01462          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;          
01463          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01464 
01465          objectiveFunctional->print();
01466       }
01467 
01468       // Resize training history
01469       
01470       resizeTrainingHistory(1);      
01471 
01472       return;
01473    }
01474    else if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
01475    {  
01476       if(display)
01477       {        
01478          std::cout << std::endl
01479                    << "Initial gradient norm is less than goal." << std::endl;
01480 
01481          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01482 
01483          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01484          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01485          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01486 
01487          objectiveFunctional->print();
01488       }
01489 
01490       // Resize training history
01491       
01492       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
01493 
01494       return;
01495    }
01496    else
01497    {
01498       if(display)
01499       {
01500          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01501 
01502          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01503          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " <<  evaluation << std::endl;
01504          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " <<  gradientNorm << std::endl;      
01505 
01506          objectiveFunctional->print();
01507       }
01508    }
01509 
01510    // Initialize tain direction stuff
01511 
01512    Vector<double> oldGradient(numberOfFreeParameters);
01513    Vector<double> trainDirection(numberOfFreeParameters);
01514    Vector<double> oldTrainDirection(numberOfFreeParameters);
01515 
01516    double trainDirectionNorm = 0.0;
01517 
01518    double slope = 0.0;
01519 
01520    // Initialize train rate stuff
01521 
01522    double initialTrainRate = 0.0;
01523    double trainRate = 0.0;
01524    double oldTrainRate = 0.0;
01525 
01526    // Loop over epochs
01527 
01528    for(int epoch = 1; epoch <= maximumNumberOfEpochs; epoch++)
01529    {
01530       // Get train direction
01531 
01532       if(epoch == 1 || epoch % numberOfFreeParameters == 0)
01533       {
01534          // Initial train direction
01535 
01536          trainDirection = gradient*(-1.0);
01537       }
01538       else
01539       {
01540          // Conjugate gradient train direction
01541 
01542          switch(trainDirectionMethod)
01543          {
01544             case FletcherReeves:
01545             {
01546                trainDirection = calculateFletcherReevesTrainDirection(oldGradient, gradient, oldTrainDirection);
01547             }//end fletcher-reeves
01548              
01549             break;
01550 
01551             case PolakRibiere:
01552             {
01553                trainDirection = calculatePolakRibiereTrainDirection(oldGradient, gradient, oldTrainDirection);
01554             }//end polak-ribiere
01555             
01556             break;
01557          }//end switch
01558       }
01559 
01560       // Calculate evaluation slope
01561 
01562       slope = gradient.dot(trainDirection);
01563 
01564       // Check for a descent direction 
01565 
01566       if(slope >= 0.0)
01567       {
01568          //if(display)
01569          //{
01570          //   std::cout << std::endl
01571          //             << "Objective function slope is equal or greater than zero."
01572          //             << std::endl
01573          //             << "Train direction reset to negative evaluation function gradient ."
01574          //             << std::endl;
01575          //}
01576 
01577          // Reset train direction
01578 
01579          trainDirection = gradient*(-1.0);
01580       }
01581 
01582       if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
01583       {
01584          trainingDirectionHistory.setRow(epoch-1, trainDirection);                                
01585       }
01586 
01587       // Train direction norm
01588 
01589       trainDirectionNorm = trainDirection.calculateNorm();
01590 
01591       if(reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory)
01592       {
01593          trainingDirectionNormHistory[epoch-1] = trainDirectionNorm;                                    
01594       }
01595 
01596       // Get initial train rate
01597 
01598       if(epoch == 1)
01599       {
01600          initialTrainRate = firstTrainRate;
01601       }
01602       else
01603       {
01604          initialTrainRate = oldTrainRate;
01605       }
01606 
01607       // Get train rate
01608 
01609       switch(trainRateMethod)
01610       {
01611          case Fixed:
01612          {
01613             trainRate = firstTrainRate;
01614                  }//end fixed
01615          
01616                  break;
01617 
01618          case GoldenSection:
01619          {
01620             trainRate = calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(initialTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01621          }//end golden section
01622 
01623          break;
01624 
01625          case BrentMethod:
01626          {
01627             trainRate = calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(initialTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01628          }//end brent method
01629 
01630          break;
01631       }//end switch
01632 
01633       if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
01634       {
01635          trainingRateHistory[0] = trainRate;                              
01636       }
01637 
01638       // Train rate stopping criterium
01639 
01640       if(trainRate == 0.0)
01641       {
01642          if(epoch == 1)
01643        {
01644           std::cout << std::endl
01645                     << "Initital train rate is zero." << std::endl;  
01646 
01647           break;
01648        }
01649        else
01650        {
01651             //if(display)
01652             //{
01653             //   std::cout << std::endl
01654             //             << "Train rate is zero for a conjugate gradient train direction."
01655             //             << std::endl
01656             //             << "Train direction reset to negative gradient." << std::endl
01657             //             << "Initial train rate reset to first train rate." << std::endl;
01658             //}
01659 
01660             // Reset train direction
01661 
01662             trainDirection = gradient*(-1.0);
01663 
01664             // Get train rate
01665 
01666             switch(trainRateMethod)
01667             {
01668                case Fixed:
01669                {
01670                   trainRate = firstTrainRate;
01671                }//end fixed
01672 
01673                break;
01674                            
01675                case GoldenSection:
01676                {
01677                   trainRate
01678                                   = calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(firstTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01679                }//end golden section
01680 
01681                break;
01682 
01683                case BrentMethod:
01684                {
01685                   trainRate 
01686                                    = calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(firstTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01687                }//end brent method
01688 
01689                break;
01690             }//end switch
01691     
01692             if(trainRate == 0.0)
01693             {
01694                if(display)
01695                {
01696                   std::cout << std::endl
01697                             << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01698                             << "Train rate is zero for gradient descent train direction." << std::endl;
01699 
01700                   std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01701                   std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01702                   std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01703                   std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01704 
01705                   objectiveFunctional->print();
01706                }
01707 
01708                // Resize training history
01709                 
01710                resizeTrainingHistory(epoch); 
01711 
01712               break;
01713 
01714            }
01715          }
01716       }
01717 
01718       // Get new free parameters
01719 
01720       freeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*trainRate;
01721 
01722       if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01723       {
01724          freeParametersHistory.setRow(epoch, freeParameters);                             
01725       }
01726 
01727       // Free parameters norm
01728       
01729       freeParametersNorm = freeParameters.calculateNorm();
01730 
01731       if(display && (freeParametersNorm >= warningFreeParametersNorm))
01732       {
01733          std::cout << "Flood Warning: Free parameters norm is " << freeParametersNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01734       }
01735       
01736      if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
01737      {
01738         freeParametersNormHistory[epoch] = freeParametersNorm;
01739      }     
01740 
01741       // Set new free parameters
01742 
01743       multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(freeParameters);
01744 
01745       // Multilayer perceptron history 
01746 
01747      if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01748      {
01749       freeParametersHistory.setRow(epoch, freeParameters);
01750      }
01751 
01752       // Objective function evaluation
01753    
01754       double oldEvaluation = evaluation;
01755 
01756       evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
01757 
01758       if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
01759       {
01760          evaluationHistory[epoch] = evaluation;                            
01761       } 
01762 
01763       // Objective function gradient
01764 
01765       gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
01766 
01767       // Gradient norm
01768 
01769       gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
01770       
01771 
01772       if(display && (gradientNorm >= warningGradientNorm))
01773       {
01774          std::cout << "Flood Warning: Gradient norm is " << gradientNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01775       }
01776 
01777       if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
01778       {
01779          gradientNormHistory[epoch] = gradientNorm;
01780       }
01781       
01782       // Stopping Criteria
01783 
01784       // Evaluation goal 
01785 
01786       if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
01787       {
01788          if(display)
01789          {
01790             std::cout << std::endl
01791                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01792                       << "Evaluation goal reached." << std::endl;
01793 
01794             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01795             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01796             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01797             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01798 
01799             objectiveFunctional->print();
01800          }
01801 
01802          // Resize training history
01803          
01804          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);          
01805 
01806          break;
01807       }
01808 
01809       // Gradient norm goal 
01810 
01811       if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
01812       {
01813          if(display)
01814          {
01815             std::cout << std::endl
01816                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01817                       << "Gradient norm goal reached."
01818                       << std::endl;  
01819 
01820             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01821             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01822             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01823             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01824 
01825             objectiveFunctional->print();
01826          }
01827 
01828          // Resize training history
01829          
01830          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01831 
01832          break;
01833       }
01834 
01835       // Minimum evaluation improvement 
01836 
01837       double improvement = fabs(evaluation - oldEvaluation);
01838 
01839       if(improvement <= minimumImprovement)
01840       {
01841          if(display)
01842          {
01843             std::cout << std::endl
01844                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01845                       << "Minimum evaluation improvement reached."
01846                       << std::endl;
01847 
01848             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01849             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01850             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01851             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01852 
01853             objectiveFunctional->print();
01854          }
01855 
01856          // Resize training history
01857          
01858          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01859 
01860          break;
01861       }
01862 
01863       // Maximum optimization time
01864 
01865       time(&currentTime);
01866 
01867       elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01868 
01869       if(elapsedTime >= maximumTime)
01870       {
01871          if(display)
01872          {              
01873             std::cout << std::endl
01874                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01875                       << "Maximum training time reached."
01876                      << std::endl;
01877 
01878             time(&currentTime);
01879             elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01880 
01881             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01882             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01883             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01884             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01885 
01886             objectiveFunctional->print();
01887          }
01888 
01889          // Resize training history
01890          
01891          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01892 
01893          break;
01894       }
01895 
01896       // Maximum number of epochs
01897 
01898       if(epoch == maximumNumberOfEpochs)
01899       {
01900          if(display)
01901          {
01902             std::cout << std::endl
01903                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01904                       << "Maximum number of epochs reached."
01905                       << std::endl;
01906 
01907             time(&currentTime);
01908             elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01909 
01910             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01911             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01912             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01913             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01914 
01915             objectiveFunctional->print();
01916          }
01917 
01918          break;
01919       }
01920 
01921       // Progress
01922 
01923       if(display && epoch % displayPeriod == 0)
01924       {
01925          std::cout << std::endl
01926                    << "Epoch " << epoch << ";" << std::endl;
01927 
01928          time(&currentTime);
01929          elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01930 
01931          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01932          std::cout << "Parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01933          std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01934          std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01935          
01936          objectiveFunctional->print();
01937       }
01938 
01939       // Update train direction stuff
01940 
01941       oldGradient = gradient;
01942       oldTrainDirection = trainDirection;
01943 
01944       // Update train rate stuff
01945 
01946       oldTrainRate = trainRate;
01947    } 
01948 }

01951 // void print(void) method
01952 
01992 
01993 void ConjugateGradient::print(void)
01994 {
01995    std::cout << std::endl
01996              << "Conjugate Gradient Object." << std::endl; 
01997 
01998    // Training operators
01999 
02000    // Train direction method
02001 
02002    std::cout << "Train direction method:" << std::endl;
02003 
02004    switch(trainDirectionMethod)
02005    {
02006       case FletcherReeves:
02007           {
02008          std::cout << "Fletcher-Reeves" << std::endl;
02009           }
02010 
02011       break;
02012 
02013       case PolakRibiere:
02014       {
02015          std::cout << "Polak-Ribiere" << std::endl;
02016       }
02017 
02018       break;
02019    }//end switch
02020 
02021 
02022    // Train rate method
02023 
02024    std::cout << "Train rate method:" << std::endl;
02025 
02026    switch(trainRateMethod)
02027    {
02028       case Fixed:
02029       {
02030          std::cout << "Fixed" << std::endl;
02031       }
02032 
02033       break;
02034 
02035       case GoldenSection:
02036       {
02037          std::cout << "Golden section" << std::endl;
02038       }
02039 
02040       break;
02041 
02042       case BrentMethod:
02043       {
02044          std::cout << "Brent Method" << std::endl;
02045       }
02046 
02047       break;
02048    }//end switch
02049 
02050 
02051    // Training parameters
02052 
02053    std::cout << "First train rate: " << std::endl
02054              << firstTrainRate << std::endl
02055              << "Train rate tolerance: " << std::endl
02056              << trainRateTolerance << std::endl;
02057 
02058    // Stopping criteria
02059 
02060    std::cout << "Evaluation goal: " << std::endl
02061              << evaluationGoal << std::endl
02062              << "Gradient norm goal:" << std::endl 
02063              << gradientNormGoal <<std::endl
02064              << "Maximum time: " << std::endl
02065              << maximumTime << std::endl
02066              << "Maximum number of epochs: " << std::endl
02067              << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl; 
02068 
02069    // User stuff
02070 
02071    std::cout << "Warning train rate:" << std::endl
02072              << warningTrainRate << std::endl
02073              << "Error train rate:" << std::endl
02074              << errorTrainRate << std::endl
02075              << "Display:" << std::endl
02076              << display << std::endl
02077              << "Display period:" << std::endl
02078              << displayPeriod << std::endl;
02079 
02080    std::cout << "Reserve elapsed time history:" << std::endl
02081              << reserveElapsedTimeHistory << std::endl 
02082              << "Reserve free parameters history:" << std::endl
02083              << reserveFreeParametersHistory << std::endl 
02084              << "Reserve free parameters norm history:" << std::endl
02085              << reserveFreeParametersNormHistory << std::endl 
02086              << "Reserve evaluation history:" << std::endl
02087              << reserveEvaluationHistory << std::endl 
02088              << "Reserve gradient history:" << std::endl
02089              << reserveGradientHistory << std::endl 
02090              << "Reserve gradient norm history:" << std::endl
02091              << reserveGradientNormHistory << std::endl 
02092              << "Reserve training direction history:" << std::endl
02093              << reserveTrainingDirectionHistory << std::endl 
02094              << "Reserve training direction norm history:" << std::endl
02095              << reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory << std::endl 
02096              << "Reserve training rate history:"  << std::endl
02097              << reserveTrainingRateHistory << std::endl;
02098 }

02260         << reserveElapsedTimeHistory << std::endl

02283 
02327 
02328 void ConjugateGradient::load(char* filename)
02329 {
02330    // File
02331 
02332    std::fstream file;
02333 
02334    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
02335 
02336    if(!file.is_open())
02337    {
02338       std::cerr << std::endl
02339                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02340                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02341                 << "Cannot open conjugate gradient object data file."  << std::endl;
02342 
02343       exit(1);
02344    }
02345    else
02346    {
02347       if(display)
02348       {
02349          std::cout << std::endl
02350                    << "Loading conjugate gradient object from data file..."  << std::endl;
02351       }
02352    }
02353 
02354    std::string word;
02355 
02356    // Training operators
02357 
02358    // Train direction method
02359 
02360    while(word != "TrainDirectionMethod:")
02361    {
02362       file >> word;
02363    }
02364 
02365    file >> word;
02366 
02367    if(word == "FletcherReeves")
02368    {
02369       trainDirectionMethod = FletcherReeves;
02370    }
02371    else if(word == "PolakRibiere")
02372    {
02373       trainDirectionMethod = PolakRibiere;
02374    }
02375    else
02376    {
02377       std::cerr << std::endl
02378                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02379                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02380                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02381 
02382       exit(1);   
02383    }
02384    
02385    // Train rate method
02386 
02387    file >> word;
02388 
02389    if(word != "TrainRateMethod:")
02390    {
02391       std::cerr << std::endl
02392                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02393                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02394                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02395 
02396       exit(1);   
02397    }
02398 
02399    file >> word;
02400 
02401    if(word == "Fixed")
02402    {
02403       trainRateMethod = Fixed;
02404    }
02405    else if(word == "GoldenSection")
02406    {
02407       trainRateMethod = GoldenSection;
02408    }
02409    else if(word == "BrentMethod")
02410    {
02411       trainRateMethod = BrentMethod;
02412    }
02413    else
02414    {
02415       std::cerr << std::endl
02416                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02417                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02418                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02419 
02420       exit(1);   
02421    }
02422 
02423    // Training parameters
02424 
02425    // First train rate
02426 
02427    file >> word;
02428 
02429    if(word != "FirstTrainRate:")
02430    {
02431       std::cerr << std::endl
02432                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02433                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02434                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02435 
02436       exit(1);   
02437    }
02438 
02439    file >> firstTrainRate;
02440 
02441    // Train rate tolerance
02442 
02443    file >> word;
02444 
02445    if(word != "TrainRateTolerance:")
02446    {
02447       std::cerr << std::endl
02448                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02449                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02450                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02451 
02452       exit(1);   
02453    }
02454 
02455    file >> trainRateTolerance;
02456 
02457    // Stopping criteria: 
02458 
02459    // Evaluation goal
02460 
02461    file >> word;
02462 
02463    if(word != "EvaluationGoal:")   
02464    {
02465       std::cerr << std::endl
02466                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02467                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02468                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02469 
02470       exit(1);   
02471    }
02472 
02473    file >> evaluationGoal;
02474 
02475    // Gradient norm goal
02476 
02477    file >> word;
02478 
02479    if(word != "GradientNormGoal:")
02480    {
02481       std::cerr << std::endl
02482                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02483                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02484                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02485 
02486       exit(1);   
02487    }
02488 
02489    file >> gradientNormGoal;
02490 
02491    // Maximum time
02492 
02493    file >> word;
02494 
02495    if(word != "MaximumTime:")
02496    {
02497       std::cerr << std::endl
02498                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02499                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02500                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02501 
02502       exit(1);   
02503    }
02504

02506 
02507    // Maximum number of epochs
02508

02510

02512    {
02513       std::cerr << std::endl

02516                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02517

02524

02526

02530    {
02531       std::cout << std::endl

02549                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02550                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02551 
02552       exit(1);

02562    {
02563       std::cerr << std::endl
02564                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl

02567

02737 
02738 
02739 // void resizeTrainingHistory(int) method
02740 
02756 
02757 void ConjugateGradient::resizeTrainingHistory(int newSize)
02758 {
02759    // Free parameters history matrix
02760 
02761    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
02762    {
02763       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02764                                         
02765       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02766                                    
02767       freeParametersHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02768    }
02769 
02770    // Free parameters norm history vector
02771 
02772    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
02773    {
02774       freeParametersNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02775    }
02776 
02777    // Evaluation history vector
02778 
02779    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
02780    {
02781       evaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
02782    }
02783 
02784    // Gradient history matrix
02785 
02786    if(reserveGradientHistory)
02787    {
02788       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02789                                         
02790       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02791 
02792       gradientHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02793    }
02794  
02795    // Gradient norm training history vector
02796 
02797    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
02798    {
02799       gradientNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02800    }
02801 
02802    // Elapsed time history vector
02803 
02804    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02805    {
02806       elapsedTimeHistory.resize(newSize);
02807    }
02808 
02809    // Training direction history matrix
02810 
02811    if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
02812    {
02813       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02814                                         
02815       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02816 
02817       trainingDirectionHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02818    }
02819 
02820    // Training direction norm history vector
02821 
02822    if(reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory)
02823    {
02824       trainingDirectionNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02825    }
02826   
02827    // Training rate history vector
02828 
02829    if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
02830    {
02831       trainingRateHistory.resize(newSize);
02832    }
02833 }
02834 
02835 
02836 // void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method
02837 
02841 
02842 void ConjugateGradient::saveTrainingHistory(char* filename)
02843 
02844 {
02845    std::fstream file; 
02846 
02847    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
02848 
02849    // Write file header 
02850 
02851    if(!file.is_open())
02852    {
02853       std::cerr << std::endl 
02854                 << "Flood Error: ConjugateGradient class." << std::endl
02855                 << "void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method." << std::endl
02856                 << "Cannot open training history data file." << std::endl
02857                 << std::endl;
02858 
02859       exit(1);
02860    }
02861    else
02862    {
02863       if(display)
02864       {
02865          std::cout << std::endl 
02866                    << "Saving training history to data file..." << std::endl;
02867       }
02868    }
02869 
02870    // Write file header
02871 
02872    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Conjugate Gradient Training History." << std::endl;
02873 
02874    // Write file data
02875 
02876    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02877    {
02878       file << "ElapsedTimeHistory:" << std::endl;
02879       file << elapsedTimeHistory << std::endl;      
02880    }
02881    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
02882    {
02883       file << "FreeParametersHistory:" << std::endl;
02884       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
02885    }
02886    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
02887    {
02888       file << "FreeParametersNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02889       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
02890    }
02891    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
02892    {
02893       file << "EvaluationHistory:" << std::endl;
02894       file << evaluationHistory << std::endl;      
02895    }
02896    if(reserveGradientHistory)
02897    {
02898       file << "GradientHistory:" << std::endl;
02899       file << gradientHistory << std::endl;      
02900    }
02901    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
02902    {
02903       file << "GradientNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02904       file << gradientNormHistory << std::endl;      
02905    }
02906    if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
02907    {
02908       file << "TrainingDirectionHistory:" << std::endl;
02909       file << trainingDirectionHistory << std::endl;      
02910    }
02911    if(reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory)
02912    {
02913       file << "TrainingDirectionNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02914       file << trainingDirectionNormHistory << std::endl;      
02915    }
02916    if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
02917    {
02918       file << "TrainingRateHistory:" << std::endl;
02919       file << trainingRateHistory << std::endl;      
02920    }
02921 
02922    file.close();     
02923      
02924 }
02925 
02926 }
